modifications: Added useEffect hook to trigger error toast when error state changes
Added Toaster component with position and richColors attributes

patterns_discovered: Error handling via toast notifications in React components
Dynamic import for components to prevent SSR
Using useEffect for side effects based on state changes
gotchas_discovered: Ensuring toast notification appears when error state changes
Properly importing and using toast from sonner library

approach_outcome.primary_goal: Add error toast notifications for API failures

recommendations: Consider adding more detailed error messages from API responses
Potentially add retry mechanism or additional error handling logic
Ensure toast notifications provide clear, actionable information to users
